definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role

sentences.english: If you have doubts, have it tested and/or get a Brita filter pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還擔心，測試下水質，或者買個純淨水過濾器。

sentences.english: There is no pollution along Hainan's sea, so its pearl is preeminent.
sentences.chinese: 海南沿海純淨無污染，海南珍珠品質超羣。

sentences.english: Just breathe that pure sea air!
sentences.chinese: 且請呼吸海上的純淨空氣。

sentences.english: Until today germanium is the present substance on earth with no exception.
sentences.chinese: 直至今天鍺才毫無異議地成爲地球上是純淨的物質。

sentences.english: It is to find a wonderland that keeps a natural savageness and set myself free there.
sentences.chinese: 這就是尋找一片純淨天然的奇境，在那裏自由的生活。

sentences.english: Jesus was pure and sinless and holy.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌是純淨，無罪和聖潔的。

sentences.english: A mother's love is like a pastoral poem, you are far from pure, and elegant light.
sentences.chinese: 母愛就象一首田園詩，幽遠純淨，和雅清淡。

sentences.english: First pure water using domestic cleaning process, to ensure the quality of organic products.
sentences.chinese: 採用國內首創純淨水清洗工藝，確保產品的有機品質。

sentences.english: Proper hydration is vital to good health and to have that, you need to drink pure water.
sentences.chinese: 適當的水合作用對身體好是重要的，您需要喝純淨水。

sentences.english: I like this piece of sky blue, pure, yet mischievous.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡這片天空的蘭色，純淨又不失調皮。

sentences.english: It inculcates purity and harmony, the mystery of mutual charity, the romanticism of the social order.
sentences.chinese: 茶道主張純淨和諧，仁慈互愛，兼具秩序與浪漫。

sentences.english: Through the ages, the Opal has symbolized hope, innocence and purity.
sentences.chinese: 穿越年齡的界線，歐泊是象徵希望，無邪，純淨。

sentences.english: Public health demands that milk and all milk products should be pure and wholesome.
sentences.chinese: 公共衛生要求乳品和所有乳製品應該是純淨衛生的。

sentences.english: Who but yourself can tell you if you are incorruptible?
sentences.chinese: 除了你自己，還有誰能告訴你，你是否純淨？

sentences.english: When it's needed, your breath weapon is pure bolts of Lightning.
sentences.chinese: 當需要時，你的龍息是純淨的閃電。

sentences.english: And so it happened that our neighborhood had become a vast acreage of sterling ice.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們家這一居民區就變成一大片純淨的冰面。

definition: to stand out from the masses (idiom)
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
